About Mike Piazza

From unheralded draft pick to perennial All Star and now 2016 National Baseball Hall of Fame Inductee, Mike Piazza has experienced an illustrious career that only few have been able to match.  With Mike’s talent, determination, and a formidable work ethic, he became one of the great players in the history of the game.
